channel.title: How do I make my serevr public

item.title: How do I make my serevr public
item.dc:creator: @jut_is_back jut_is_back
item.description:
@jut_is_back wrote:

[quote=“eanhl2005, post:1, topic:90408”]how do i make ir public like i said il ltell you[/quote][quote=“Chatty, post:2, topic:90408”]i wanna know this too ill tell you[/quote][quote=“eanhl2005, post:3, topic:90408”]ye i no its hard one guy told me nbuti it got deated
not is kinda easy ill explain now[/quote][quote=“FLIPPER182, post:4, topic:90408”]go to www.google.com and search download hamachi when ur search is done click the first one and download any one you want. when you have downloaded it open hamachi wait for it to connect. when it connects click the button at the bottem that looks like a triangle. click “join an existing network” it says type in the server name and password…

for server name type “EXAMPLE MY SERVER” god scape5

for password type 1

then press join…then you are done all you have to do now is type in the ip “5.119.155.173” and the port “43594” and you can now have fun =]

~flipper182~[/quote] hams for wireless networks anyaways how to make a server have all ur firewalls down have the moparscape client downloaded down load testscape compile and run test scape if u get an error doing it deleted it and look for a new one. Lol doubt it thought anyways

when ur done with that comes portforwarding if u got a comcast or dsl router ur good, skip this’

just have firewalls down

then set varible paths which is also important to fix javac error not recongized

much orless its explaining the basics simple u got to go here www.no-ip.info it takes u to where u can make a server ip to make people play on it.

U NEED TO MAKE A IP NOT ME. but use things that arnt copy right?..ull get sued Lol

as soon as u download the important stuff Then ur good backround check everything thought and then click run server
log on
and enjoy

to make ur self admin is basicly set player rights = 3 OWNER
2 ADMIN
1 MOD
0 PLAYER

item.title: How do I make my serevr public
item.dc:creator: @FLIPPER182 FLIPPER182
item.description:
@FLIPPER182 wrote:

go to www.google.com and search download hamachi when ur search is done click the first one and download any one you want. when you have downloaded it open hamachi wait for it to connect. when it connects click the button at the bottem that looks like a triangle. click “join an existing network” it says type in the server name and password…

for server name type “EXAMPLE MY SERVER” god scape5

for password type 1

then press join…then you are done all you have to do now is type in the ip “5.119.155.173” and the port “43594” and you can now have fun =]

~flipper182~

Read full topic
